HomePageComponent.body:
Listed below are owner rules for the Salesforce Case and Reference Core Payroll record.
  • Ownership changes are to be made on the Case record and not the Reference Core Payroll record. 
  • Changes can not be made to the Reference Core Payroll record as long as the record is owned by a queue, the NCS has to take ownership from the queue.
  • When the owner of the Case record is changed, the owner of the Reference Core Payroll record is updated automatically.

 

If you have Salesforce requests, questions and issues, please contact your operations Regional Assistant.
